trends: There has been one other sighting in Amelia
There were no other sightings in Amelia on or around April 5th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was on my way home from a friends house i had my family with me 5 of us in all wife daughter and twin 15 year old boys.1of my sons noticed them first.there was what looked like a flamming light\ball maybe moving rather slow but moving no sound at all.we all kinda looked at each other as we watched then another 1 came right behind the first 1.they both went the same way.then we saw the 3rd 1.they were not moving fast but they were going up not down.slowly 1by they disapeared into the sky up into the sky if i can figure out how to post a picture my daughter got a picture of 1 with her phone.kinda just looks like an orange light.
Summary: 3 fire balls all flying above tree level no noise.They were big not small.
